sect2.title: Contents of Sh-utils
sect2.para: The Sh-utils package contains a number of basic shell manipulation utilities.

sect3.title: Program Files
sect3.para: basename, chroot, date, dirname, echo, env, expr, factor, false, groups, hostid, id, logname, nice, nohup, pathchk, pinky, printenv, printf, pwd, seq, sleep, stty, su, tee, test, true, tty, uname, uptime, users, who, whoami and yes
